rows.intro_text:
We often don’t look after ourselves enough. But this is so important, especially as a parent! 

Reducing our stress and treating ourselves well helps us AND our teenagers.

intro_text.eng:
We often don’t look after ourselves enough. But this is so important, especially as a parent! 

Reducing our stress and treating ourselves well helps us AND our teenagers.

script.eng:
Greetings, everyone.

Today's topic is self-care.

There are times when we experience challenges, face problems and do not know what to do. It is important to take care of ourselves to learn the techniques for keeping ourselves calm, in case problems, challenges or issues come up.

When we are calm we are in a good state to think positively and come up with positive solutions to any challenges we may be facing.

rows.script:
Greetings, everyone.

Today's topic is self-care.

There are times when we experience challenges, face problems and do not know what to do. It is important to take care of ourselves to learn the techniques for keeping ourselves calm, in case problems, challenges or issues come up.

When we are calm we are in a good state to think positively and come up with positive solutions to any challenges we may be facing.
rows.title: Why @data.workshop.w_self_care.lower_case_title?

rows.intro_text:
Being a parent can be so hard. Sometimes it feels like our children never listen to us.

But science shows that spending just a few minutes each day of focused one-on-one time with your teen helps build trust and love.

intro_text.eng:
Being a parent can be so hard. Sometimes it feels like our children never listen to us.

But science shows that spending just a few minutes each day of focused one-on-one time with your teen helps build trust and love.

text.eng:
One-on-one time is when you focus on them, without TV or phones. Let them lead what you do or talk about.

It is great if you can do twenty minutes a day, but even five minutes a day is really good.

script.eng:
Hello.

Our topic today is one-on-one time with our children.

It is important to spend time with our children so that they can get to understand us, and for us to get an opportunity to understand them.

Remember, a family with good understanding lives in harmony.

rows.text:
One-on-one time is when you focus on them, without TV or phones. Let them lead what you do or talk about.

It is great if you can do twenty minutes a day, but even five minutes a day is really good.
rows.script:
Hello.

Our topic today is one-on-one time with our children.

It is important to spend time with our children so that they can get to understand us, and for us to get an opportunity to understand them.

Remember, a family with good understanding lives in harmony.
rows.title: Why @data.workshop.w_1on1.lower_case_title?

rows.intro_text:
Praise is a powerful parenting skill.

If we praise our teens when they do something well, we will see them do more and more positive things!

intro_text.eng:
Praise is a powerful parenting skill.

If we praise our teens when they do something well, we will see them do more and more positive things!

script.eng:
Greetings everyone. 

Our topic today is about praise. 

It is good to praise our children when they've done good because when we do that, they will do more of that good behavior we want to see. 

And let's not forget to praise ourselves when we do good too!

rows.script:
Greetings everyone. 

Our topic today is about praise. 

It is good to praise our children when they've done good because when we do that, they will do more of that good behavior we want to see. 

And let's not forget to praise ourselves when we do good too!
rows.title: Why @data.workshop.w_praise.lower_case_title?

rows.intro_text:
Focus on the positive! 

Telling our teens what we DO want them to do works better than telling them to STOP doing something.

You will see the difference.

intro_text.eng:
Focus on the positive! 

Telling our teens what we DO want them to do works better than telling them to STOP doing something.

You will see the difference.

script.eng:
Greetings, greetings everyone.

Today our topic is positive instructions. 

It is important to give positive instructions to our children, because when we give them positive instructions they know and understand what we are expecting them to do, and they do it the way we want them to do it. 

So, at the end it keeps everyone happy.

rows.script:
Greetings, greetings everyone.

Today our topic is positive instructions. 

It is important to give positive instructions to our children, because when we give them positive instructions they know and understand what we are expecting them to do, and they do it the way we want them to do it. 

So, at the end it keeps everyone happy.
rows.title: Why @data.workshop.w_instruct.lower_case_title?

rows.intro_text: We know how stressful it is to bring up teenagers in these times. Learning to manage your stress helps you – and your family.

intro_text.eng: We know how stressful it is to bring up teenagers in these times. Learning to manage your stress helps you – and your family.

script.eng:
Greetings everyone. 

Today's topic is managing stress. 

It is important to know how to manage our stress. At times our children can behave in ways that make us feel stressed and us as parents can make our children feel stressed too. 

So, it is important to notice when we feel stressed and take a pause and breathe. That will help you manage your stress.

rows.script:
Greetings everyone. 

Today's topic is managing stress. 

It is important to know how to manage our stress. At times our children can behave in ways that make us feel stressed and us as parents can make our children feel stressed too. 

So, it is important to notice when we feel stressed and take a pause and breathe. That will help you manage your stress.
rows.title: Why @data.workshop.w_stress.lower_case_title?

rows.intro_text:
Every family faces challenges, but when we work together we can deal with problems in an effective and peaceful way. 

What a great skill for your teen to learn too!

intro_text.eng:
Every family faces challenges, but when we work together we can deal with problems in an effective and peaceful way. 

What a great skill for your teen to learn too!

script.eng:
Greetings, everyone. 

Today's topic is problem solving. 

We all know that in life there are times where we face problems, and we all know in a way that when we find ourselves in these situations, it is difficult to think of immediate positive solutions. 

Therefore, it is important that when we are facing problems we take a pause, we breathe, keep calm and think of problem-solving skills that we may use. 

Remember to include our teenagers when we are solving problems. This will help them to become responsible and learn how to solve their own problems in the future.

rows.script:
Greetings, everyone. 

Today's topic is problem solving. 

We all know that in life there are times where we face problems, and we all know in a way that when we find ourselves in these situations, it is difficult to think of immediate positive solutions. 

Therefore, it is important that when we are facing problems we take a pause, we breathe, keep calm and think of problem-solving skills that we may use. 

Remember to include our teenagers when we are solving problems. This will help them to become responsible and learn how to solve their own problems in the future.
rows.title: Why @data.workshop.w_solve.lower_case_title?

rows.intro_text:
Many families are stressed about money, especially if teens keep asking for things! 

When we make a budget together, we can agree how to spend AND save to prevent stress and work towards our family’s goals.

intro_text.eng:
Many families are stressed about money, especially if teens keep asking for things! 

When we make a budget together, we can agree how to spend AND save to prevent stress and work towards our family’s goals.

script.eng:
Greetings, everyone. 

Today's topic is family budgeting. 

It is important to create a budget, but it is even more important to create a budget involving the entire family. 

Doing it together helps increase the level of understanding of how you spend money as a family and how much you save for the family, and you can even come up with plans of how you can save as a family.

rows.script:
Greetings, everyone. 

Today's topic is family budgeting. 

It is important to create a budget, but it is even more important to create a budget involving the entire family. 

Doing it together helps increase the level of understanding of how you spend money as a family and how much you save for the family, and you can even come up with plans of how you can save as a family.
rows.title: Why @data.workshop.w_money.lower_case_title?

rows.intro_text:
Rules help teens understand what is expected from them. 

Teens are more likely to follow rules if you create the rules WITH your teen and praise them for it!

intro_text.eng:
Rules help teens understand what is expected from them. 

Teens are more likely to follow rules if you create the rules WITH your teen and praise them for it!

script.eng:
Greetings, everyone. 

Today's topic is rules. 

Rules promote peace within the household and promote understanding amongst family members. 

Rules promote responsibilities for each family member; therefore, it is important to have family rules. 

A household with family rules lives in peace.

rows.script:
Greetings, everyone. 

Today's topic is rules. 

Rules promote peace within the household and promote understanding amongst family members. 

Rules promote responsibilities for each family member; therefore, it is important to have family rules. 

A household with family rules lives in peace.
rows.title: Why @data.workshop.w_rules.lower_case_title?

rows.intro_text:
Our actions have consequences: Some consequences happen naturally (“if you break something, you can’t use it anymore”). Other consequences we set as a family to motivate us to follow the rules (“if you come home late, you can’t go out with friends tomorrow”).

HOW you set and use consequences together matters.

Getting consequences right helps teens behave better and makes family life calmer.

intro_text.eng:
Our actions have consequences: Some consequences happen naturally (“if you break something, you can’t use it anymore”). Other consequences we set as a family to motivate us to follow the rules (“if you come home late, you can’t go out with friends tomorrow”).

HOW you set and use consequences together matters.

Getting consequences right helps teens behave better and makes family life calmer.

script.eng:
Greetings, everyone. 

Today's topic is calm consequences.

It is important that when we introduce consequences to our teenagers we involve them, but also important that we are calm when we introduce consequences.

That will assist in us to agree on introducing calm consequences to our teenagers and our teenagers will easily remember them when they are involved and that will make them responsible.

rows.script:
Greetings, everyone. 

Today's topic is calm consequences.

It is important that when we introduce consequences to our teenagers we involve them, but also important that we are calm when we introduce consequences.

That will assist in us to agree on introducing calm consequences to our teenagers and our teenagers will easily remember them when they are involved and that will make them responsible.
rows.title: Why @data.workshop.w_consequence.lower_case_title?

rows.intro_text:
Teens can spend a lot of time outside the house or online, where it is harder for us to keep them safe. 

Talking together about safe and unsafe places, and how to prevent problems, really helps!

intro_text.eng:
Teens can spend a lot of time outside the house or online, where it is harder for us to keep them safe. 

Talking together about safe and unsafe places, and how to prevent problems, really helps!

script.eng:
Greetings, everyone. 

Today our topic is teen safety. 

It is our responsibility as parents to keep our teens safe at all times. We need to ensure that our teenagers are safe in the communities that we live in. It is our responsibility that we make them aware of the safe and unsafe areas in the communities. 

It is also our responsibility to ensure that they understand the dangers that they might be exposed to when they are online. That way our teenagers will be responsible and be able to make right decisions to keep themselves safe too.

rows.script:
Greetings, everyone. 

Today our topic is teen safety. 

It is our responsibility as parents to keep our teens safe at all times. We need to ensure that our teenagers are safe in the communities that we live in. It is our responsibility that we make them aware of the safe and unsafe areas in the communities. 

It is also our responsibility to ensure that they understand the dangers that they might be exposed to when they are online. That way our teenagers will be responsible and be able to make right decisions to keep themselves safe too.
rows.title: Why @data.workshop.w_safe.lower_case_title?

rows.intro_text: All families experience crises. When we prepare together and know where to get help BEFORE something bad happens, we can overcome any crisis.

intro_text.eng: All families experience crises. When we prepare together and know where to get help BEFORE something bad happens, we can overcome any crisis.

script.eng:
Greetings, everyone.

Today's topic is dealing with crises.

Crises may occur anywhere. Crises may occur anytime. Therefore, it is important as a family to have plans in place should any family member find themselves in a crisis situation. 

It is important to have plans so that every family member may feel protected. 

When we are dealing with crises, remember to take a pause, breathe, and keep yourself calm. That will help you to deal with crises better.

rows.script:
Greetings, everyone.

Today's topic is dealing with crises.

Crises may occur anywhere. Crises may occur anytime. Therefore, it is important as a family to have plans in place should any family member find themselves in a crisis situation. 

It is important to have plans so that every family member may feel protected. 

When we are dealing with crises, remember to take a pause, breathe, and keep yourself calm. That will help you to deal with crises better.

@data.workshop.w_celebrate.title

intro_text.eng:
CONGRATULATIONS! You have done it! You have built 11 important parenting skills. 

This is a huge achievement. It shows such care for your family. 

Let’s celebrate you, and plan your future @global.parent_app support.

script.eng:
Greetings everyone.

Today’s topic is celebration and next steps.

It has been amazing, it has been wonderful having you on this journey. Today we are celebrating our journey together. 

Today we are celebrating all the learnings that we have learnt throughout.

rows.intro_text:
CONGRATULATIONS! You have done it! You have built 11 important parenting skills. 

This is a huge achievement. It shows such care for your family. 

Let’s celebrate you, and plan your future @global.parent_app support.
rows.script:
Greetings everyone.

Today’s topic is celebration and next steps.

It has been amazing, it has been wonderful having you on this journey. Today we are celebrating our journey together. 

Today we are celebrating all the learnings that we have learnt throughout.

rows.intro_text: Teenagers go through a lot of changes, both in their bodies and in how they feel and experience the world.

intro_text.eng: Teenagers go through a lot of changes, both in their bodies and in how they feel and experience the world.

text.eng:
Think back to your own teenage years: 
* Did you ever experience a difficult situation as a teenager around body changes? And what about relationships? 
* What kind of support or information do you wish you had at the time?
* Do you think your teen may be experiencing any challenges in these areas?

script.eng:
Today's topic is body changes and intimate relationships. 

Teenagers go through a lot of changes, both in their bodies and in how they feel and experience the world. By speaking with them you can help them handle this change as well. 

Let your teen know you may not have all the answers, but you are there to support them and find solutions together. That way your teen knows you are there to listen and talk. You will not judge or shame them and can support them to make healthy and confident decisions.

rows.text:

* Did you ever experience a difficult situation as a teenager around body changes? And what about relationships? 
* What kind of support or information do you wish you had at the time?

rows.intro_text:
To keep our teens safe, we need to understand their reality and the potential risky situations they can find themselves in.

We can help our teens know how to use their thoughts, voice, AND body in dangerous situations. It makes a big difference!

intro_text.eng:
To keep our teens safe, we need to understand their reality and the potential risky situations they can find themselves in.

We can help our teens know how to use their thoughts, voice, AND body in dangerous situations. It makes a big difference!

script.eng:
Greetings. Greetings. 

Today's topic is sexual violence prevention. 

Why is it important to stay safe? To keep our teens safe, we need to understand their reality and potential risky situations they can find themselves in. We can help our teens know how to use their thoughts, voice and body in dangerous situations. It makes a big difference.

rows.script:
Greetings. Greetings. 

Today's topic is sexual violence prevention. 

Why is it important to stay safe? To keep our teens safe, we need to understand their reality and potential risky situations they can find themselves in. We can help our teens know how to use their thoughts, voice and body in dangerous situations. It makes a big difference.
rows.title: Why @data.workshop.w_svp.lower_case_title?

rows.intro_text:
Grief affects us all in different ways. 

Whatever you feel, you are grieving in your own way, and that is okay.

intro_text.eng:
Grief affects us all in different ways. 

Whatever you feel, you are grieving in your own way, and that is okay.

script.eng:
Greetings everyone. 

Today's topic is coping with grief. 

Grief affects us all in different ways. Some people shout, some cry, some feel angry, and some feel very sad. We can feel different each day. Sometimes we feel better, then worse, then better again. 

Whatever you feel, you are grieving in your own way and that is okay. Children and adults have similar emotions when it comes to death, but they handle these emotions in different ways. By sharing how you feel and being kind to yourself and each other you can support each other well.

rows.script:
Greetings everyone. 

Today's topic is coping with grief. 

Grief affects us all in different ways. Some people shout, some cry, some feel angry, and some feel very sad. We can feel different each day. Sometimes we feel better, then worse, then better again. 

Whatever you feel, you are grieving in your own way and that is okay. Children and adults have similar emotions when it comes to death, but they handle these emotions in different ways. By sharing how you feel and being kind to yourself and each other you can support each other well.
rows.title: Why @data.workshop.w_grief.lower_case_title?

rows.intro_text:
Did you know that your one-on-one time with your teen can help them at school?  Today we will share some ideas on how to do this.

By spending time with them, you teach them important life skills that will help them at school and at home.

intro_text.eng:
Did you know that your one-on-one time with your teen can help them at school?  Today we will share some ideas on how to do this.

By spending time with them, you teach them important life skills that will help them at school and at home.

script.eng:
Hello dear caregiver. 

Today's topic is helping your teen learn. 

It is important to talk about the power of learning through play with your teen. Life is very busy, and we know it is difficult to find time to spend with your teen. By spending time with your teen, you may teach them important life skills that will help them at school and at home. 

Even when spending time together may be short you can do small things that will make a big difference in you and your teen’s life.

rows.script:
Hello dear caregiver. 

Today's topic is helping your teen learn. 

It is important to talk about the power of learning through play with your teen. Life is very busy, and we know it is difficult to find time to spend with your teen. By spending time with your teen, you may teach them important life skills that will help them at school and at home. 

Even when spending time together may be short you can do small things that will make a big difference in you and your teen’s life.
rows.title: Why @data.workshop.w_learn.lower_case_title?
